EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2018.SF No Shows
EmailTemplate.subject: We’re sorry to have missed you at SpringOne Tour 2018 in San Francisco.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We're sorry to have missed you in San Francisco last week. Looking for slides from SpringOne Tour? You can find them, along with blogs, videos and all things Spring related here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-tour-san-francisco?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-springonetour-sf-q418]]>.
In the meantime, get started <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/pcf-tutorials/getting-started-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-springonetour-sf-q418]]> with Spring on Cloud Foundry: for free on the public cloud, or on your workstation.
I hope to see you at a future event!
Thanks, Tasha Isenberg tisenberg@pivotal.io <[[mailto:tisenberg@pivotal.io]]>
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. <[[http://info.pivotal.io/GAU0JW200t0BI0CN00000A0]]>Unsubscribe <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html]]>.
